item.title: Planned Maintenance at 2014-10-07 06:00 UTC
item.description: We need to bring the server down for maintenance again. It shouldn't take more than an hour. Specifically, the server will be down for approximately 1 hour starting at 06:00 UTC Tuesday, 2014-10-07.
item.dc:creator: george

item.title: Planned Maintenance at 2014-10-04 07:00 UTC
item.description: We've been investigating an issue that causes the server to lag. As part of the troubleshooting I will need to bring the server down for a while on Saturday. Specifically, the server will be down for approximately 1 hour starting at 07:00 UTC Saturday, 2014-10-04.
item.dc:creator: george

item.title: Mobs are Live!
item.description:
Animals and monsters now inhabit Liberty Land

During the day, you will encounter some frindly animals. You can be frinds with them, or you can kill them. I don't care either way. But be careful though! During the night and in the dark, there are monsters. You can't be friends with them, they will try to kill you.

Craft your sword and get ready to fight!
item.dc:creator: george

item.title: Worldmap is Live!
item.description: I am very happy to announce, we now have an amazing interactive map of Liberty Land which you can see at maps.ayntest.net.
item.dc:creator: george

item.title: Planned Maintenance at 2014-09-04 05:00 UTC
item.description: Our super awesome admin, sol, needs to do some h4x0r computer magic on our game server to make it more amazing. As a result, the server will be down for approximately 3 hours starting at 05:00 UTC tomorrow, 2014-09-04.
item.dc:creator: george

item.title: some downtime
item.description: We are experiencing some problems with our db. We're not going anywhere, but it might take a while.
item.dc:creator: george
